alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 10:44AM EST until February 12 at 3:46AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, Newburgh Dam, and J.T. Myers Dam. .Recent precipitation caused the Ohio River to rise. The river at Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, Newburgh Dam, and J.T. Myers will remain in minor flood as they have already crested, or will crest soon, and they will all fall below flood stage sometime this weekend. For the Ohio River...including Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 41.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 38.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
